body_html: No, the transform is required in order to let the tensorflow know which ops should be run on HVX because some HVX ops are not optimized and may be much slower than CPU. So, user needs to optimize the graph manually by using fuse_remote_graph.
body_text: No, the transform is required in order to let the tensorflow know which ops should be run on HVX because some HVX ops are not optimized and may be much slower than CPU.  So, user needs to optimize the graph manually by using fuse_remote_graph.
body: No, the transform is required in order to let the tensorflow know which ops should be run on HVX because some HVX ops are not optimized and may be much slower than CPU.  So, user needs to optimize the graph manually by using fuse_remote_graph.
